## pylint

```shell
python3 -m pip install pylint
```

```shell
pylint --generate-toml-config >> pyproject.toml
```

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.pylint.main]

ignore-patterns = ["^\\.#", ".*_pb2.pyi?"]

[tool.pylint."messages control"]

disable = [
  "raw-checker-failed",
  "bad-inline-option",
  "locally-disabled",
  "file-ignored",
  "suppressed-message",
  "useless-suppression",
  "deprecated-pragma",
  "use-symbolic-message-instead",
  "missing-module-docstring",
  "missing-class-docstring",
  "missing-function-docstring",
  "too-few-public-methods",
  "too-many-arguments",
  "bare-except",
  "invalid-name",
  "line-too-long"
]
```

```shell
pylint **/*.py
```

## black

```shell
python3 -m pip install black
```

```shell
black **/*.py
```

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.black]
exclude = '''
/(
    \.eggs
  | \.git
  | \.hg
  | \.mypy_cache
  | \.nox
  | \.tox
  | \.venv
  | _build
  | buck-out
  | build
  | dist
)/
'''
include = '\.pyi?$'
line-length = 100
```

## isort

```shell
python3 -m pip install isort
```

```shell
isort --profile black **/*.py
```

- https://pycqa.github.io/isort/docs/configuration/options.html

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.isort]
line_length = 100
profile = "black"
skip_gitignore = true
```
